name: Conquer and Breed the Demon Queen
name_original: Conquer and Breed the Demon Queen
description:
The art of summoning is more dangerous than people think! If you summon something stronger than you, you could end up being the slave instead of the master! Our protagonist has been playing it safe, summoning nothing but slimes, unfortunately the hero and the rest of the party are pretty sick of it and they kick him out! In a fit of rage our summoner friend pours all his mana (and dirty thoughts) into the most powerful summon of his life! Things don't go according to plan though, instead of summoning the sexy servant of his dreams he ended up being summoned by the Demon Queen herself!
Shocked, afraid, and a little bit horny. The poor summoner prepared to accept his defeat at the hands of the Demon Queen Lucifer but he has one ace up his sleeve, the familiar binding ritual! As his last ditch effort he challenged Lucifer to a sex competition to save his soul and potentially enslave hers! See how the summoner fares in this twisted tale of betrayal, revenge, and the filthiest of sexy times as he conquers and breeds this busty Demon Queen!
Conquer and Breed the Demon Queen is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.
Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
Lucifer and her sister are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
Hours of story content
Audio including music and special effects
Enhanced with character sprite animations
Gallery and Scene selections
20 scenes of unparalleled depravity with your sexy summoned Demon Queen!
PLEASE NOTE
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.
